title: Test Knowledge Pack Retrieval and Injection
description: Write tests to verify the retrieval service returns correct facts packs, enforces token/byte caps, and Lane B injects facts into responses. Test citation inclusion and error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Retrieval service returns correct facts pack for sample queries
Token/byte cap is enforced in results
Lane B includes facts and citations in responses
Error cases (missing facts, malformed queries) are handled
